articles.author: Kritti Bhalla
articles.title: Zomato and Swiggy invest in this restaurant management company that fulfils 2 in 10 food deliveries in India
articles.description: India’s biggest food delivery businesses Zomato and Swiggy on Monday morning announced their latest investment in a restaurant management company called UrbanPiper.
articles.content:
India’s biggest food delivery businesses Zomato and Swiggy on Monday morning announced their latest investment in a restaurant management company called UrbanPiper.
UrbanPiper — founded by Saurabh G… [+2225 chars]
